        tathā mahābhāṣye dvitīye pāde vibhāṣā chandasīti sūtre 'śaṃ no	taTA mahA BAzye dvitIye pAde viBAzA Candasi iti sUtre aSam no
   devīḥ', 'agnimīĉī̆e' 'iṣe tvā' 'agna ā yāhi' iti | ādau	devIH a, aagnimIĉĬe a aize tvA a aagne A yAhi a iti | AdO
   atharvavedastato'nye vedāḥ.	aTarvavedaH tatas anye vedAH.
        tathā nirukte catvāri śṛṅgā iti vyākhyātam.	taTA nirukte catvAri SRFgAH iti vyAKyAtam.
        tathā atharvavede brāhmaṇe catvāri śṛṅgā ityṛcā catvāro vedāḥ iti	taTA aTarvavede brAhmaNe catvAri SRFgAH iti RcA catvAraH vedAH iti
   vyākhyātam.	vyAKyAtam.
        tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ prathamapāde vedādhikaraṇe atharvavedasya	taTA mImAMsAyAm praTama pAde veda aDikaraNe aTarvavedasya
   śākhādvayamudāhṛtaṃ paippalādaṃ maudakamiti | akṛtakā nityāḥ pramāṇaṃ vedā	SAKA dvayam udAhRtam pEppalAdam mOdakam iti | akRtakAH nityAH pramANam vedA
   iti sthāpitam ||	iti sTApitam ||
        tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ dvitīye'dhyāye sarvaśākhādhikaraṇe paippalādaṃ	taTA mImAMsAyAm dvitIye aDyAye sarva SAKA aDikaraNe pEppalAdam
   maudakamiti atharvavedasya śākhādvayamudāhṛtya sarvaśākhāpratyayakrame	mOdakam iti aTarvavedasya SAKA dvayam udAhRtya sarva SAKA pratyaya krame
   sthāpitam ||	sTApitam ||
        tathā tṛtīye'dhyāye pravargyādhikaraṇe caturṣvapi vedeṣu na	taTA tRtIye aDyAye pravargya aDikaraNe caturzu api vedezu na
   prathamayajño nāma yajño'sti caturvedagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam | caturṇāṃ vedānāṃ	praTama yajQaH nAma yajQaH asti catur veda grahaNam kRtam | caturNAm vedAnAm
   yajñārthamuktam | bhāṣyakāreṇa tathā atharvavedādhikaraṇe catvāri śṛṅgeti	yajQa arTam uktam | BAzya kAreNa taTA aTarvaveda aDikaraNe catvAri SRFga iti
   catvāro hotrakāḥ prativedamiti vyākhyātam.	catvAraH hotrakAH prativedam iti vyAKyAtam.
        tathā nyāyamañjaryāṃ   catvāro vedāḥ | prathamo atharvaveda iti.	taTA nyAyamaQjaryAm  catvAraH vedAH | praTamaH aTarvavedaH iti.
        pūrvabrāhmaṇe   atharvavedena trayo vedāḥ kṛtāḥ | atho lokā	pUrva brAhmaNe  aTarvavedena trayaH vedAH kRtAH | aTo lokA
   vedādayaśca | tathā atharvavede brāhmaṇe   atha ha prajāpatiḥ somena	veda AdayaH ca | taTA aTarvavede brAhmaNe  aTa ha prajApatiH somena
   yakṣyamāṇo vedānuvācakaṃ vā hotāraṃ vṛṇīyāt | kamadhvaryuṃ kamudgātāraṃ	yakzyamANaH veda anuvAcakam vA hotAram vRNIyAt | kam aDvaryum kamudgAtAram
   kaṃ brāhmaṇamiti | ta ūcurṛgvidameva hotāraṃ vṛṇīṣva yajurvidamadhvaryuṃ	kam brAhmaNam iti | te UcuH Rc u idam eva hotAram vRNIzva yajurvidamaDvaryum
   sāmavidamudgātāramatharvāṅgirovidaṃ brahmāṇam | tathā hāsya yajñaścaturṣu	sAma vida mudgAtAram aTarvA aFgiraH vidam brahmANam | taTA ha asya yajQaH caturzu
   lokeṣu caturṣu deveṣu caturṣu vedeṣu catasrāsu hotrāsu catuṣpādyajñaḥ	lokezu caturzu devezu caturzu vedezu catasrAsu hotrAsu catuzpAdya jQaH
   pratitiṣṭhati | pratitiṣṭhati prajayā paśubhirya evaṃ veda | tathānucarāpi	pratitizWati | pratitizWati prajayA paSuBiH yaH evam veda | taTA anucara api
   tadvido bhavanti | caturṣvapi vedeṣu ||	tad vidaH Bavanti | caturzu api vedezu ||
        tathā uttare brāhmaṇe  	taTA uttare brAhmaNe  
             catuṣpāta sakalo yajñaścātuhautravinirmitaḥ.	catuzpAta sakalaH yajQaH cAtu hOtra vinirmitaH.
             caturvidhaiḥ sthito mantrairṛtvigbhirvedapāragaiḥ ||	caturviDEH sTitaH mantrEH RtvigBiH vedapAragEH ||
        bhārate sabhāparvaṇi brahmasabhāyāṃ catvāro vai brahmapārśve	BArate saBA aparvaNi brahma saBAyAm catvAraH vE brahma pArSve
   tiṣṭhanti mūrtimantāḥ ||	tizWanti mUrtimantAH ||
        pūrvabrāhmaṇe triviṣṭapaṃ tridivaṃ nākamuttamaṃ tametayā trayyā	pUrva brAhmaNe trivizwapam tridivam nAkam uttamam tam etayA trayyA
   vidyayeti | ata uttare brahmalokā	vidyayA iti | atas uttare brahma lokA
   mahānto'tharvaṇāmaṅgirasāṃ ca sā gatiratharvaṇāmaṅgirasa ca sā gatiriti	mahAntaH aTarvaNAm aFgirasAm ca sA gatiH aTarvaNAm aFgirasa ca sA gatiH iti
   brāhmaṇam ||	brAhmaNam ||
   iti kauśikapaddhatiḥ samāptā ||	iti kOSika padDatiH samAptAH ||
